reviews.review:
TL:DR 
Portal is a great game and difficult in some places but it's very short.

Portal is probably one of my favorite games I've ever played. It's got funny dialogue and some very good puzzles and it's worth the price but this game has one problem, it's short. I've almost beat it twice but most of my time is probably just me sitting in a pause menu or just a menu. It does have a great final boss and a great credits scene but the final level is very long.  I haven't got around to playing the bonus levels or trying to get transmission received but I will sometime soon. 

However, if you had to choose between this or Portal 2, get Portal 2. It's longer and has funnier dialogue, harder puzzles and it's just better in almost every single way.

Final Rating: 7/10

Very fun and interesting puzzles.  Advanced maps if you thought the main story wasn't challenging enough, and challenges that make you work harder for your victory each step.  A short story but very enjoyable.  Loved it when it came out, love it to this day.
